abstract: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York named Glenn H. Hutchins as a new director, adding a private equity voice on the regulator’s board.
snippet: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York named Glenn H. Hutchins as a new director, adding a private equity voice on the regulator’s board.
lead_paragraph: Private equity is again getting a seat at the table at the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.

headline.main: Silver Lake’s Hutchins Named a Director of the New York Fed

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
